TopicTitle: My game is randomly crashing during loadings

Articles.Content:
Hello , my problem is that the game keeps crashing during loadings . Not all of them , i'd say taht it's 1 out of 5 loading that the game closes.

Crash Report :

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.6.4f1_99f88340878d]

KSP.exe caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module KSP.exe at 0023:0121f237.

Error occurred at 2016-03-01_211328.
I:\Steam SSD\steamapps\common\Kerbal Space Program\KSP.exe, run by EklypsiSs.
78% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [1712 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [85 MB free].
Write to location 00101000 caused an access violation.

Context:

EBX:    0x0004c400  ECX: 0x0000003b  EDX:   0x00000000
EIP:    0x0121f237  EBP: 0x004fea68  SegCs: 0x00000023
EFlags: 0x00010206  ESP: 0x004fea60  SegSs: 0x0000002b

Bytes at CS:EIP:
f3 a5 ff 24 95 50 f3 21 01 8b c7 ba 03 00 00 00 

any help would be welcome.
